ActionsManager

Method Detail

load

public void load(Context context,
                 org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                 org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads images and creates every sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, register touch areas and set ZIndexes.

Parameters:
context - Android context, to retrieve files
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

activate

public int activate(float x,
                    float y,
                    float width,
                    float height,
                    int[] states,
                    boolean area)
Looks for what actions are possible for item/anim/area touched.

Parameters:
x - touched x, allows to position action manager icons
y - touched y, allows to position action manager icons
width - width of touched item/anim/area, allows to position action manager icons
height - height of touched item/anim/area, allows to position action manager icons
states - which action(s) is/are allowed for the touched item/anim/area
area - allows to position action manager icons, depending on the fact that the touched object is an area or not
Returns:
actions 0=no action possible; 1=take; 2=look; 3=take+look; 4=talk; 5=take+talk; 6=look+talk; 7=take+look+talk

showPossibleActions

public void showPossibleActions(float x,
                                float y,
                                float width,
                                float height,
                                boolean area,
                                int actions)
Set and displays possible actions for item/anim/area touched.

Parameters:
x - touched x, allows to position action manager icons
y - touched y, allows to position action manager icons
width - width of touched item/anim/area, allows to position action manager icons
height - height of touched item/anim/area, allows to position action manager icons
area - allows to position action manager icons, depending on the fact that the touched object is an area or not
actions - 0=no action possible; 1=take; 2=look; 3=take+look; 4=talk; 5=take+talk; 6=look+talk; 7=take+look+talk

deactivate

public void deactivate()
Hides every action and set action manager sprites outside screen to avoid activating by touched them (AndEngine allows touching invisible sprites).

freeze

public void freeze(int action)
When an action is chosen, this one only stays visible and its animation stop running.

Parameters:
action - chosen action
